sentences.english: Former vice mayor jailed for taking bribes.
sentences.chinese: 安徽马鞍山市副市长因受贿入狱。

sentences.english: Our company is located on the south bank of Yangzi River, Maanshan of steel city.
sentences.chinese: 公司坐落于长江南岸，素有“钢城”之称的马鞍山市。
